content.text: Match ends, Liverpool 3, Southampton 0.
Second Half ends, Liverpool 3, Southampton 0.
Hand ball by Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool).
Attempt missed. Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Alberto Moreno.
Virgil van Dijk (Southampton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jordan Henderson (Liverpool).
